title: Update app icon with new Rawly41 circular logo

requirements.text: Replace all existing app icons (192x192, 512x512, and Apple touch icons) with the newly uploaded circular Rawly41 logo featuring pink dripping text on turquoise swirl background with white border (Gemini_Generated_Image_z68096z68096z680-5.png)
acceptanceCriteria: The manifest.json file references the new icon files generated from the uploaded image
The frontend/index.html Apple touch icon meta tag points to the new 180x180 icon
All icon sizes (192x192, 512x512, 180x180) are generated from the new circular logo design
The icons display correctly when the app is added to home screen on both iOS and Android devices

constraints: Do not modify the manifest.json structure or PWA configuration beyond updating icon file references
Maintain the existing icon naming convention and directory structure in frontend/public
nonGoals: Changing the app name or theme colors in the manifest
Modifying the logo displayed in the header/navigation

required: App icon at 192x192 pixels showing the circular Rawly41 logo with pink dripping text on turquoise swirl background with white border (icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
App icon at 512x512 pixels showing the circular Rawly41 logo with pink dripping text on turquoise swirl background with white border (icon-512.dim_512x512.png)
Apple touch icon at 180x180 pixels showing the circular Rawly41 logo with pink dripping text on turquoise swirl background with white border (apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
